TopicTitle: Please add more snap points to structural pieces

Articles.Content: It's a pain to snap for example, 2 of those long rectangular, structural beam pieces parallel to eachother because they only have snap points on their ends. They should have some radially on the ends so you can make a box and radially in the middle so you can attach other beams perpendicularly. Simply turning off clipping isn't that effective because you can't get them lined up nicely and in the same spot consistently.
